column2: # create person-level data frames for each study
# Make sure Intervention is the non-reference group for Treatment
fit4 = glm(Outcome ~ Treatment + Study + Treatment:Study, data = data4,

glm(formula = Outcome ~ Treatment + Study + Treatment:Study, 
    family = "binomial", data = data4)
Null deviance: 1029.6  on 799  degrees of freedom
Residual deviance:  819.8  on 794  degrees of freedom
